Articles.Content:
Hello fellow modders, I have a question.

 

Is it possible to make a custom vessel type? I think I would need to write a plugin but I don't know if it is even possible to make one for this.

By vessel types, I mean like these.

Thanks for the help!

Well, the vessel types is an enum, I'm notrying sure what you can do about that.

What sort of vessel type do you want to make, anyway?
I want to make a "Communication" vessel and "Classified" Vessel..... for an upcoming RP I'm doing for youtube

Vessel Type is an enum so it's locked. You'd have to completely replace the vesseltype system with a plug-in mod that completely replaced that functionality.

A pretty big undertaking for something that would not be a big change really.

D.
